decision_conditions: The development to which this consent relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date on which the consent is granted.

Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, as amended, to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 202 Rev 08 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 203 Rev 00 (Fireplace Tiles Details); 304 Rev 08 (Proposed Rear Elevation, Section BB); 306 Rev 01 (Window Sill Construction Detail).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policy 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2021). | Suitable precautions shall be undertaken to secure and protect all interior and exterior elements against accidental loss or damage during building work and no such elements shall be disturbed or removed temporarily or permanently except as indicated on the approved drawings or with the prior written approval of the local planning authority.

Reason: To protect the architectural and historic fabric of this Listed Building, in accordance with policy 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2021).

| Any damage to the building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the work permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development, in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To protect the architectural and historic fabric of this Listed Building, in accordance with policy 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2021).

| Details of the fireplace tiles of the hereby approved listed building consent shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to their installation. The listed building consent shall be implemented only in accordance with these approved details and and permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: To protect the architectural and historic fabric of this Listed Building, in accordance with policy 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2021).
description: Alteration of the windowsills of the ground-floor dining room, kitchen and storage; replacement of fireplace tiles to the hall and bedroom and new fireplace tiles to the dining room (Listed Building Consent)
